title: you have disconnected , please check your internet connection and try again HELP !!
body:
my loading screen freezes at 0% then that error appears 
you have disconnected , please check your internet connection and try again
then reconnect freeze at 0% then the error etc , help plz

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be some issues between your computer and the server. Since this is often caused by certain network settings blocking your access, I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if this steps helped.

I have reported this issue for 4 seasons now. You get logged to PVP.net, but the system tell that you cannot connect to game istance. Anyone who is ANY skill at all in networking would deduct problem is either server side, client connection code, or server connection code. Only way to resolve this "load screen crash" is to restart client as many times as needed and hope server accepts your connection. 

THis is persistent issue RIot has totally ignored in any way, but prevent me reporting crashes of other players in game. They got pissed I proved how abundant problem is and they do not want to do anything to it. IN game side this appears "x has reconnected" "x has disconnected" chain.
